# Firebase FormatDate&dollar;
<!--
@name: Firebase FormatDate&dollar;
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Format a date to a desired format
## Parameters

- **dateTime&dollar;**: The date to be formatted
- **format&dollar;**: A date format string, example "DD-MM-YYYY"
---
